user.description: Volvo on Call is depreceated, use Volvo integration

abort.deprecated: Volvo On Call has been replaced by the Volvo integration. Please use the Volvo integration instead.

volvooncall_deprecated.title: Volvo On Call has been replaced
volvooncall_deprecated.description:
The Volvo On Call integration is deprecated and will be removed in 2026.3. Please use the Volvo integration instead.

Steps:
1. Remove this Volvo On Call integration.
2. Add the Volvo integration through Settings > Devices & services > Add integration > Volvo.
3. Follow the setup instructions to authenticate with your Volvo account.
